channel.title: Stuck on server
channel.description:
Hi, im still creating a server.. and im stuck on this part:
KEY 1 = Any name you want the server to be (I.E.MyScape).[/glow] 2 = The IP adddress of your COMPUTER; not the Internet. Then save it. Ok now you can save settings after the rule is saved. Every router is different. Check with the manuals for yours to fully understand how to open the ports. If you cannot find/have a manuel, go to this address:
im on my router login page, but can someone tell me where to go? (e.g, advance> ?? > ??
Thanks, PK master

item.title: Stuck on server
item.dc:creator: @Twirly Twirly
item.description:
@Twirly wrote:

i was just stuck on the ‘Key’ , how do you get your IP into your source to run the server.

And how/where do i put the name of my server.[br][size=1]Posted on: March 28, 2007, 04:57:09 PM[/size][hr]Anyone know ?

item.title: Stuck on server
item.dc:creator: @pacman89012 pacman89012
item.description:
@pacman89012 wrote:

ok if ur trying to make a server heres all u gotta do… download winrar jdk6 etc then download a source… oipent he source in winrar and extract to specified folder… doulbe clikc on desktop then hit ok. once u open it to desktop exit out of winrrar. then you open it from desktop and scroll donw to compile. hit c to comile or maby its autro compiler. then open the cmpiler again and type r to run. boom u have a server

item.title: Stuck on server
item.dc:creator: @Twirly Twirly
item.description:
@Twirly wrote:

Hi, im still creating a server… and im stuck on this part:

KEY
1 = Any name you want the server to be (I.E.MyScape).[/glow]
2 = The IP adddress of your COMPUTER; not the Internet.
Then save it. Ok now you can save settings after the rule is saved. Every router is different. Check with the manuals for yours to fully understand how to open the ports. If you cannot find/have a manuel, go to this address:

im on my router login page, but can someone tell me where to go?
(e.g, advance> ?? > ??

Thanks, PK master
